review: I have  consulted for my father age 62 having high blood sugars. I promise sugars start coming down with in two weeks thanks to Doctor.I really won't bothered about wait time or response time results matters to me.If you are having high sugars  please consult once you won't regret.

Visited the doctor for a skin infection since he is listed as a general physician on the platform. After we reached the clinic, we saw that he is a diabetologist. In his consultation he connected everything to diabetes and ordered tests from his own lab. His lab took 2X the amount of money for *** ****** blood test like heamoglobin, lipid profile,etc. Also the medicines provides costed higher *** **** *** **** *** ** * ********** The whole visit costed us 7k tests doctor fees and medicine included. Now everything is fine in reports, even better than what was last year. ****** ** ** order tests when we asked him genuine questions on lesions happening on the same place again and again. **** ******* ***** ***** **** *** ****** ***** he connected things to diabetes and ordered tests. ******* ****** ** ****** **** ****** **** ******** ** ******* **** *** **** * ******* ********* ******* ** ************* *******

review: Dr Tiwari is good to dealt with the diseases and very friendly. Dr Tiwari knows how to treat a patient. It's very important that a doctor give a mental satisfaction with his behavior. A good doctor can help people learn to cope with stressful situations, overcome addictions, manage their chronic illnesses, and tests and assessments that can help diagnose a condition or tell more about the way a person thinks, feels, and behaves. These are the benefits u ll get with Dr Tiwari. A real moral booster. Kahte hai aadhi bimari mental hoti hai.  Thank you so much Dr. Tiwari sir. Regards Amitabh Gunjan
